recordTypes.name: 1. Signing Up, Creating a Profile & Accessing Your Information
recordTypes.description: Instructions on signing up for a ViewPoint Cloud Account and how to access your profile and records.

recordTypes.name: 2. Applying for a Permit & Paying Fees
recordTypes.description: How to apply for a permit and pay any fees that are due.

recordTypes.name: 3. Receiving Your Permit or Other Document
recordTypes.description: How to view and print your issued permit, license, or other issued document.

recordTypes.name: Final Plat
recordTypes.description: The Final Plat provides the legal and technical data required to confirm compliance with Glynn County Regulations and to proceed with the final approval process for a subdivision.  The Final Plat shall consist of a map or maps, drawn at a scale of not less than one inch in one hundred feet. (Note:  References are to Article VII of the Glynn County Regulations - §709)(scale 1”=100’)

recordTypes.name: Abandonment
recordTypes.description: Application to remove dedicated public interest on specific rights-of-way.

recordTypes.name: Zoning Letter
recordTypes.description: This is a request for a zoning certification letter

recordTypes.name: Home Occupation Tax Registration- In Home Business
Tax Refund
recordTypes.description: Any taxpayer from whom a tax or license fee was collected who alleges that such tax or license fee was collected illegally or erroneously may file a claim for a refund with the Glynn County Board of Commissioners at any time within one year or, in the case of taxes, three years after the date of the payment of the tax or license fee to Glynn County.

recordTypes.name: Close Business
recordTypes.description: This form should be completed when a business ceases operation in order to officially close the business and stop the assessment of annual Occupation Taxes.

recordTypes.name: Tree Removal Request
recordTypes.description: St. Simons Island property owners Live Oak tree removal request.

recordTypes.name: Reduced or Waived Fee Request Form
recordTypes.description: Fee waivers and reductions are considered for non-profit and community engagement events at county parks. Requests are subject to board approval. A representative must attend the Finance Committee meeting to speak on behalf of the request.

recordTypes.name: NO SOLICITATION LIST
recordTypes.description: Complete this form to be added to the No Solicitation List which prohibits door-to-door sales at the registered address. This list is provided to all applicants for a door-to-door solicitor applicants.

recordTypes.name: Fireworks Permit
recordTypes.description: Permit to Conduct Public Exhibition or Display of Fireworks and/or Fireworks or Pyrotechnics Exhibition or Display Before a Proximate Audience.

recordTypes.name: STR Certificate Application- Individual
recordTypes.description: This application is for individual property owners who rent one or two locations.

recordTypes.name: STR Master Certificate Application- Property Managers
recordTypes.description: This application is for individuals and companies who manage the rental process for three or more locations.

recordTypes.name: Add/Remove Property from Master Certificate
recordTypes.description: Complete this form to add or remove a property from your MASTER CERTIFICATE. (This is not to be used for individual STR certificates)

recordTypes.name: PTV Permit
recordTypes.description: Personal Transportation Vehicle Registration Form

recordTypes.name: Condemnation
recordTypes.description: For a condemnation to be reviewed, there needs to be at least 5 Glynn County residents filing a complaint. Please add any additional applicants in the additional applicants section.

recordTypes.name: Plat Vacation
recordTypes.description: Any plat or any part of any plat may be vacated by the owner of the premises, at any time before the sale of any lot therein by filing a written instrument to which a copy of such plat shall be attached, declaring the same to be vacated. Such an instrument shall be executed, acknowledged or approved, and recorded or filed, in like manner as plats or subdivision; and being duly recorded or filed shall operate to destroy the force and effect of the recording of the plat so vacated, and to divest all public rights in the streets, alleys, and public grounds, and all dedications laid out or described in such plat. Sec. 803 Subdivision Regulations

recordTypes.name: Foundation Only
recordTypes.description: Foundation only permits must be approved by The Glynn County Community Development Department before an application may be submitted. Please contact the Community Development Department at 912-554-7459 for more information.

recordTypes.name: Rezoning
recordTypes.description: Application to amend or change the zoning classification of a property as depicted on the Official Zoning Map of Glynn County

recordTypes.name: Expedited Subdivision
recordTypes.description: Applications for subdivisions or modification of a previously approved subdivision as set forth in Subdivision Regulations Article VIII

recordTypes.name: Feather Banner Permit
recordTypes.description: A free-standing temporary sign typically constructed with a plastic or metal shaft driven in the ground and an attached pennant typically in the shape of a feather, teardrop or rectangle that is vertically elongated and attached to a shaft.

recordTypes.name: Subdivision Construction Plans
recordTypes.description:
Application that typically follows approval of a preliminary plat of a subdivision to describe, in detail, any physical improvements related to streets, drainage, and utilities. 
If the site is on septic, you must attach a Level 3 Soil Evaluation to this application and have applied for a commercial septic tank permit with the Department of Public Health.
